Package frc.team1711.swerve.util.odometry

Class Odometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • frc.team1711.swerve.util.odometry.Odometry
  • public class Odometry
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used in coordination with AutoSwerveDrive in order to track the position of the robot on the field.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Odometry​(AutoSwerveDrive swerveDrive, AutoSwerveWheel frontLeftWheel, AutoSwerveWheel frontRightWheel, AutoSwerveWheel rearLeftWheel, AutoSwerveWheel rearRightWheel)
      Creates a new Odometry object which tracks the position of an AutoSwerveDrive on the field.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Position getPosition()
      Gets the current Position of the robot on the field.
      void resetPosition​(Position newPosition)
      Resets the robot's odometry to a given Position.
      void update()
      Used in order to update the estimated robot location on the field.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Odometry

        public Odometry​(AutoSwerveDrive swerveDrive,
                AutoSwerveWheel frontLeftWheel,
                AutoSwerveWheel frontRightWheel,
                AutoSwerveWheel rearLeftWheel,
                AutoSwerveWheel rearRightWheel)
        Creates a new Odometry object which tracks the position of an AutoSwerveDrive on the field. This constructor method should not be called outside of the AutoSwerveDrive class. Use methods on the AutoSwerveDrive class in order to access odometry functionality.
        Parameters:
        swerveDrive - The AutoSwerveDrive subsystem.
        frontLeftWheel - The front left AutoSwerveWheel.
        frontRightWheel - The front right AutoSwerveWheel.
        rearLeftWheel - The rear left AutoSwerveWheel.
        rearRightWheel - The rear right AutoSwerveWheel.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Used in order to update the estimated robot location on the field. This method is automatically called by AutoSwerveDrive every time the robot's movement kinematics are set.

      • resetPosition

        public void resetPosition​(Position newPosition)
        Resets the robot's odometry to a given Position.
        Parameters:
        newPosition - The new Position for the robot's odometry

      • getPosition

        public Position getPosition()
        Gets the current Position of the robot on the field.
        Returns:
        The robot's Position
